name: Nekobro Life 2
description:
meet Nekobro! he is a fluffy cubic cat who lives in a world full of funny things and memes

but a creepy presence called Alvin came from the Moon into Nekobro's realm and stole again the funny things in his realm!

will Nekobro stop him again?

we wanted to conclude our 2022 with style, we published the first two installements of the Nekobro saga, i think now we will rest till the end of the year and then return again next year! we are working on more games, wait until 2023, we published enough projects this year, this is the god tier conclusion :3

main programming by Cannibal Girl Games (Hide + Giacomo)

some graphics and musics by Giacomo Cingolani

some other graphics and musics are taken from the internet.

this project is free, we dont make money from other people's work.

Cannibal Girl Games would like to thank Alecs, Miku, Stivale, Rox and Saul Sadman, whose precious tips and support through Discord helped us for making the game.
